We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RelativeVigorIndex _rvi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rvi = RVI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rvi.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "RVI Signal", _rvi.Signal);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RVI Current", _rvi.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rvi = self.RVI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rvi.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RVI Signal", self.rvi.Signal);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RVI Current", self.rvi.Current);
